item.title: Clarke Quay is shimmering with holiday spirit this Christmas
item.description: This Christmas season at Clarke Quay is all about celebrating and enjoying the festivities. Visitors can delight in the luminous displays along the river or snap photos with Christmas characters every Friday and Saturday from 8 pm to 10 pm until December 30th around Clarke Quay and Read Bridge. From December 5th to 7th, between 5 pm and 11 pm, shoppers can explore a wide selection of handcrafted goods at the Artisan Pop Up Christmas Market located in Central Fountain Square.
